newsitem.title: KUWAIT: Kuwait-listed UAE firm to present annual results.
newsitem.headline: Kuwait-listed UAE firm to present annual results.

text.p: The Kuwait Stock Exchange (KSE) on Wednesday said United Arab Emirates' Umm al-Quwain Cement Company has pledged to release its 1996 results by the end of April.
KSE had warned that it would suspend the firm's shares if it did not present the 1996 results to KSE by April 15, an official told Reuters on Monday.
The firm notified KSE that it would supply the required figures after the Moslem Eid al-Adha holiday which ends on April 21, the bourse said.
Its shares were trading on Wednesday at around 97 fils ($0.32), down from a March 30 high of 104 fils. Dealers said the market was expecting strong 1996 profits.
There are 1,000 fils to the dinar.
